com.adobe.internal.xmp.utils

Class XMLStreamWriterImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.internal.xmp.utils.XMLStreamWriterImpl

  • public class XMLStreamWriterImpl
extends java.lang.Object
    Uncomplete implementation of XMPStreamWriter of the upcoming XML Streaming API, that is adapted to be used for XMPCore. Adds automatically correct closing of empty tags > and pretty printing. Simplifies namespace handling; just tracks if a certain prefix has already been registered. FfF: If StAX will become part of the JRE, it might be replaced.
    Since:
    09.11.2006
